Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

So, the most kerbal-esque thing I've done in my life was going to art school.

As a result, I'm a video-artist, and I am also working as a sound designer/composer for short films and multimedia projects.

I've been digging my drawers lately and thought I could reinvest a dusty Youtube account with recreational combinations of video sequences from KSP and audio works I've done in the past years.

The idea is to keep it simple. I'll tinker with drones, plain melodies and loops to build slow-paced audiovisual merry-go-rounds and quiet sonic mobiles.

Fullscreen intended.

Cheers.

First music box is here.

Click this big Bob.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLe8xTF22QliGEzHSqKFY5HavCFQeuYqTy" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T03:26:15Z" title="07/08/2015 03:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**

***Bob's Music Box 2, Sun*** is online.

Again, fullscreen intended.

Cheers.

Please click this big little Bob.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iKZZDjULFx0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T03:03:45Z" title="07/01/2015 03:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**
Punted to Fan Works by request.
